promoCards.title: Deep Siren Angler
powers: {Angler} deals 1 target 1 sonic damage. Redirect the next damage dealt by each target dealt damage this way to {Angler}
incapacitatedAbilities: One hero may use a power
One player may play a card
Destroy a target with 2 or less HP. If a target is destroyed this way, one hero gains 2 HP.

openingLines.default: Grumble grumble... fishlady... grumble... geas... grumble... mermaid...
openingLines.CharybdisCharacter: You smashed my ship! Now this's personal!

cards.title: Angler
powers: You may play a Bait card or draw a card.
incapacitatedAbilities: One player may draw a card.
One hero may use a power.
You may destroy a hero non-character card. If you do, that card's owner may deal 1 target 3 projectile damage.

openingLines.default: You'll be the catch of the day!
openingLines.CharybdisCharacter: This is what my family trains for! I'll make Grandpappy proud!
openingLines.OblivAeonFrontPageCharacter: We got joy no matter what you do!

cards.title: Charged Lure
body: Redirect damage dealt to {Angler} or the SS Langley to this card. When this card is destroyed, you may destroy an ongoing or environment card.

cards.title: Chum Bucket
body: The first time each turn {Angler} destroys a target, you may put a Bait card from your trash into your hand.
powers: {Angler} deals 1 target 1 melee damage. Play a Bait card.

cards.title: Depth Charge
body: {Angler} deals each non-hero target 2 sonic damage. Destroy an environment card.

flavorQuotes.text: Ta kill such a great monster,{br}we're gonna need some real firepower.

cards.title: Designated Victim
body: Play this next to a hero. Redirect damage dealt to other heroes to that hero. Redirect damage dealt to that hero to a Bait card. At the start of your turn, destroy this card.

cards.title: Electrofishing
body: {Angler} deals each non-hero target 1 lightning damage. Reduce damage dealt by each target dealt damage this way by 2 until the start of your next turn.

flavorQuotes.text: I call that a stunnin' development!

cards.title: Fishing Tackle
body: {Angler} deals 1 target 3 melee damage. Either play a Bait card or redirect the next damage dealt by that target to Angler.

flavorQuotes.text: She ain't gettin' away from me!

cards.title: Gone Fishin'
body: Draw 3 cards. {Angler} gains 3 HP. Immediately end your turn.

flavorQuotes.text: Dammit! Where's Angie when{br}you need her!?

cards.title: Hook, Line, and Sinker
body: After one of your targets is dealt damage, {Angler} may deal the source of that damage 5 melee damage. If damage is dealt this way, destroy this card.

cards.title: Noodle Around
body: Draw 2 cards. One non-hero target deals {Angler} 1 irreducible melee damage.

flavorQuotes.text: Sometimes, ya gotta stick your hand in a hole, see what bites.

cards.title: Set Lines
body: Search your deck for a Bait card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck. You may play any number of Bait cards.

cards.title: SS Langley
body: When {Angler} would be dealt damage by a source other than this card, you may redirect it to this card. The first time each turn a Bait card is destroyed, draw a card. When this card is destroyed, {Angler} deals herself 3 irreducible cold damage and 3 irreducible psychic damage.

flavorQuotes.text: She's a good ship. My grandpappy's ship.

cards.title: Taunting Beacon
body: Redirect damage dealt to {Angler} or the SS Langley to this card. When this card is destroyed, it deals each non-hero target 2 sonic damage.

cards.title: Trusty Harpoon
powers: {Angler} deals 1 target 3 projectile damage. If a non-character target is dealt damage this way, redirect damage dealt by that target to {Angler} until the start of your next turn.

cards.title: Wriggling Worm
body: Redirect damage dealt to {Angler} or the SS Langley to this card. When this card is destroyed, {Angler} may deal 1 target 3 melee damage.
